title: P780_ROW_S123_131231
description:
STOCK ROM ROW123 4GB

Latest update of LENOVO P780

Warning:

Do not flash for 4GB devices mod on 8GB devices or 8GB devices mod on 4GB devices, will causes bootloop and IMEI problems etc.

WARNING:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ This will void your warranty.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Do with your own risk.


Assuming the drivers are correctly installed, run the Smart Phone Flash Tool. 

Click on scatter-loading and choose the scatter file "MT6589_Android_scatter_emmc.txt" of the ROM you want to flash. 

Make sure the checkbox "DL DA All With Check Sum" is CHECKED 

Click on "Firmware->Upgrade" button. 

Plug in your powered down phone via the USB cable again. See it flash. 

When a big green circle appears on the screen, your are done!
